name: Nocturnal YouTube Theme.
description: Colors are extremely easy to edit, just edit the hex colors at the top under ":root"! Updated to work on the latest layout update, definitely a work in progress. Look on my DA for another preview.

user.name: Chloe Chantelle
user.about: Yo! I'm Chloe Chantelle, these are themes I make by either request or just using the site frequently. If you like what I do you can either donate or email me about a commission! uwu

additional_info: ~ Requires ~ Open Sans Semibold font. 21.11.17 ~ Fixed bg of watch later playlist. 17.11.17 ~ Fixed logo. 12.11.17 ~ Fixed small issues, updated logo. 09.10.17 ~ Fixed small issues in the description/comments section. 27.09.17 ~ Updated color of logo. 20.06.17 ~ Fixed small non-themed areas. 18.06.17 ~ Fixed update for bg. 12.06.17 ~ Fixed small background and border issues. 27.04.17 ~ Updated to fix issues w/ the old layout. 23.04.17 ~ Remade theme for layout update. 13.03.17 ~ Fixed logo. 18.02.17 ~ Themed live chat. 11.02.17 ~ Should work w/ the latest layout update, let me know if it works/there's any problems! 09.02.17 ~ Made small changes, made fonts a lot easier to change via the :root. 03.02.17 ~ Fixed lots of problems, remade parts of sub pages. 16.01.17 ~ Fixed small problems. 19.12.16 ~ Fixed more button text, notification bell bg. 18.12.16 ~ Fixed small problems, fixed notification bg. 7.12.16 ~ Fixed video uploader comment bg. 19.11.16 ~ Updated for the new thumbnail seekbar, fixed small problems. 30.9.16 ~ Fixed bugged Add To/Share video buttons and Watch Later hover button. 30.7.16 ~ Fixed watch later button. 17.7.16 ~ Changed text color of liked video. 2.7.16 ~ Changed how the tick looks when a video is added to watch later. 23.6.16 ~ Rewrote theme, changed basically everything, works with and without YTC and in both Firefox and Chrome. 28.5.16 ~ Changed whole theme, now works w/ Chrome. 5.5.16 ~ Updated and moved elements, fixed lots of small things. 4.3.16 ~ Changed logo and app guide button, fixed some white areas, themed progress bar. 07.11.15 ~ Made colors very easy to change (included :root selectors). ~ Change the yt logo and app logo. 11.10.15 ~ Fixed not being able to click the app dropdown, fixed shadows not working around the player. 23.09.15 ~ Fixed small areas that weren't themed correctly. 03.08.15 ~ Fixed autoplay and fixed sub button. 16.07.15 ~ Changed some colors and fixed placement of video and contents around it. 07.07.15 ~ Updated colors and font and a bunch of other things, updated link to my YTC settings :3 20.03.15 ~ Changed all font 04.03.15 ~ Fixed #DearMe logo. 02.03.15 ~ Works without YTC, properly, now. 25.02.15 ~ Completely redid CSS, search bar works correctly, videos are the same width as content and header. 21.02.15 ~ Fixed player location, now moves to center of page no matter what browser/browser size. 11.02.15 ~ Fixed header. 10.01.15 ~ Fixed playlists 08.01.15 ~ Transparent top bar ~ Fixed button text 06.01.15 ~ Aligned video with content 01.01.15 ~ Updated fonts, fixed grid, no longer requires YouTube Center 22.12.14 ~ Changed likes/dislikes count color 21.10.14 ~ Fixed video player, adding padding 07.10.14 ~ fixed width of video player 28.09.14 ~ fixed black border under video player 26.09.14 ~ fixed top comments drop down bar ~ removed description box shadow 30.08.14 ~ top searchbar now autohides ~ descriptions have been removed from feed ~ videos no longer have that black bar ~ removed the top borders along the description and show more lines ~ removed the 'more' button

discussions.name: Very nice, could use some improvements.
Titles have a white box surrounding them?
